column3: Latest;An American died of a drug induced heart attack in Phnom Penh.------The death occurred on January 28
column4: 2020 at 1 pm in 19 HAPPY HOUSE Hostel
column9: Khan Daun Penh Phnom Penh.------ JASON AARON MEINHART was a 40 year old tourist.------Authorities went to examine the scene and tests showed he died from an overdose of morphine/heroin------After inspection
column10: the body was sent to Wat Teuk Thla
